name: Unauthorized PO DFM
query:
select 
po.workflow_state as "Status",
po.name as "Purchase Order No",
po.po_type as "Purchase Order Type",
po.transaction_date as "Purchase Order Date:Date:100",
po.supplier as "Supplier/Vendor Name",
pi.item_name as "Item Name",
item.category as "Item Category",
item.item_sub_group as "Item Sub Group",
item.item_group as "Item Group",
pi.item_code as "Item Code",
pi.po_qty as "PO Qty:Float:100",
pi.rate as "Rate:Float:100",
pi.amount as "Gross Total:Float:100"


from `tabPurchase Order` po , `tabPurchase Order Item` pi , `tabItem` item
Where pi.parent=po.name  and 
item.item_name=pi.item_name and 
workflow_state= "Pending For Approval" ;
